runs.comm: delivers a back of a length, going across the left-hander, as this one is defended away to the off side
gets off the mark with a pull shot through midwicket that gives the batsman an opportunity to complete a brace with the space on offer
gets in about half a stride before defending this fullish length away on the leg side
rides the bounce of this back of a length going across him
short of a length which is pulled away through backward square

delivers a length delivery across the batsman which Imrul looked to shoulder arms too, with the ball catching the bottom-edge of the bat before flying through to Dhoni. Dhawan and Raina in the slips were interested, but the keeper had a stone face on. Must not have heard it...
gets wonderful carry to this back of a length delivery going across the batsman
splays this fuller one down the leg side, with the umpire swiveling around to the scorers
delivers a short of a length, well wide across the batsman, as Tamim is not interested to have a go
on a good length and shaping away from outside off, Tamim plays inside the line and lets it go
able to pick up a brace through backward square
back of a length and well outside off. Tamim rides with the bounce and steers it to the left of point
fuller length delivery and a hint of nip back into Tamim, he was pushing forward and gets an inside edge towards square leg
on a length and going away with the angle, Tamim covers the line, lifts his bat and lets it go
has a flash at this back of a length which goes across him, with the ball nipping away at the last moment
gets nicely behind the line of this back of a length on middle and off
rush of blood from Kayes as he charges down the track, with Yadav shortening his length and getting this to angle across the left-hander. Ends up missing this entirely
nicely behind the line of this length delivery on middle and off
Yadav bangs one short and on the stumps. Kayes shuffles across, with the ball getting big on him, and he hops across awkwardly and manages to fend it away towards the on side
fuller length, on and around off, which is met with a dead, straight bat. Got that one up at around 146 kph.
has a wild slash at this shortish length going across him, but this gets away from him in the end
pitched up on middle and leg as this one is defended back towards the bowler
overpitched as Tamim is able to lean quite beautifully into this drive through long off to find the boundary
full again from the bowler as this one is tucked away softly on the leg side
first time width has been offered as Tamim is able to cream this away through point to find the square boundary
another hit-me delivery, bowled outside of off, as Tamim is able to now crunch this through the covers to find the extra-cover boundary

short of a length, on leg, which is tucked away towards the leg side, as the close-in fielder is able to pick up the ball and fire in a throw at the non-striker's when he sees the batsmen backing up a bit too far. Ends up making a direct hit, but the batsman had already grounded his bat
tries to help himself to a single on the leg side, but fails to achieve the result
looks to guide one away square off the wicket, but is held by the man at point
Imrul attacks this length delivery outside off, with the ball almost making its way to the deep extra-cover boundary, despite a misfield on the ring
now looks to help himself to a single on the leg side, but can't find the requisite space
gets a leading edge to this attempted glance on the leg side, with the ball bobbling over towards the covers
tries to whip a single off the pads, but picks out the man at square-leg instead
delivers a length delivery on middle which is clipped away on the leg side
gets away an uppish slice through third man to this back of a length from Mohit
comes down the track to this shortish length going across, with Tamim slicing this away high and over third man to get a much-needed boundary
far too short from Mohit as he now pulls the seamer over to deep midwicket, but not well enough to get to the rope
advances down once more to this short of a length ball going across, with this one catching the bottom-edge to fly over towards third man, but just short of the fielder in the deep
tries to whip away a single on the leg side, but is late on this back of a length delivery on middle and leg
clips away this length delivery on middle towards the mid-on region
eases away a run behind of square on the leg side to get to the other end

Yadav has got his man as Tamim, chasing after this length delivery which just nips away, ends up catching the outside edge of Tamim's flashing blade, with Dhoni taking a good, low catch to his left to take it. Tamim is not convinced though as he wants the umpires to review whether this one indeed carried cleanly to the Indian captain. Shows the ball went in cleanly upon second viewing. Tamim has to go

Bangladesh falling apart here in the space of two balls as a huge mix-up between Soumya and Imrul has got the other opener back into the shed now. Soumya was guilty of ball-watching, along with Imrul, who backed up quite a bit before realising his partner had sold him down the river. Tries in vain to get back to his end at the non-striker's, but the fielder at short backward square was able to fire in a pinpoint throw at the right end as Yadav collected and flicked off the bails in time. Looks like it was Jadeja who had put in the fine work in the field
gets nicely on top of the bounce of this back of a length delivery outside off
defends away this length delivery on middle and leg to complete a potentially match-turning over
keeps to the channel to the new batsman, Mahmudullah knocks it down behind point with the open face
tight lines from Mohit and the batsman is happy to let the short of a good length delivery outside off sail past him

ripper! That's what happens with the new ball when you put it in the right areas. Upright seam hits the deck just back of a length and weaves away from Mahmudullah's defensive push. Had to play at it...
gets forward to a slightly fuller delivery and pushes to the left of mid-off
slips down the leg side, Mahmudullah shaped to flick but then left it alone to collect the wide
full and curling just a shade away, Mahmudullah presses forward and throws his bat outside off. Gets a thick outside edge that soars through the gap between slip and gully
keeps him quiet with a good length ball on off stump
banged into the middle of the deck, Sarkar slips under it
caught in the crease and wafts outside off, Yadav's fuller length means he gets the ball to nip away just enough and beat the bat
back of a length on middle and off, defended
shortish and on the pads, Sarkar clips it behind square leg
refuses to be sucked into a good length ball floated a bit wider of off stump
back of a length and outside off, goes for a slash and misses. India are generating just enough movement and are being helped quite a bit by the two new batsmen's lack of footwork at present
goes a bit too short and Sarkar has pulled of a spectacular ramp. Sways his body away and plants the open face to lift the bouncer over the keeper
back of a length on off stump, defended
a touch slower perhaps on middle and leg, Sarkar clips towards midwicket
beaten for pace! And length too considering it wasn't quite short enough for the flay through point. Inches forward a bit and looks to force the ball away. Doesn't look balanced, beaten
pins him to the crease with a 137 kph delivery that was angled in on off stump, Sarkar manages a thick inside edge to negate the lbw appeal
back of a length on off stump, Sarkar says beside it and runs it down to third man
good length ball on middle and leg, defended
tossed up on middle and off, kept out
goes back to a slightly shortish delivery and slices it to point
a bit of turn as he holds the ball back and gives it a bit of a rip. Sarkar waits, adjusts and dabs it behind point
allows the batsman to jump back in the crease and pushes to long-on
flighted on middle, Sarkar gets behind it with an angled face
tossed up on off stump, sent towards a widish mid-on
leans forward and outside off to hit with the turn to square leg
a touch flatter and he goes back to bunt the ball to mid-on
pushed through on middle and Mahmudullah has to hurry to top it from sneaking through his defences
good length ball outside off, slid behind point
worked away to the right of mid-on, but the fielder races across, dives and keeps it to nothing
back of a length and outside off, slapped through point for a single
another heavy sort of delivery on off stump, Mahmudullah is kept in his crease and his bat turns on impact as he defends
that's a brilliant strike! Saw the fuller length early, took a few steps down, made a touch of room for himself and swung the arms clean through the shot.
wanders away to the leg side again, but this time Mohit's pulled his length back and makes the batsman mistime his intended flash through the off side. Inside edge wanders through square leg
just short of a good length and outside off, driven on the up through point
nice and tight on off stump, Mahmudullah plays with soft hands as he dabs straight of midwicket and sets off
gets nice and low, also outside the line to knock lbw out of play and sweeps a flighted delivery from off stump to long leg
lunges forward and gives the bowler a heads up that he's going to sweep, Raina shortens his length and makes the batsman get an inside edge
goes around the wicket to the left-hander and tosses the ball up outside off, driven past the diving Raina
gets a good stride forward to reach out to a good length ball outside off and drives behind point
lures him on the drive, but Mahmudullah appears happy to oblige. Finds long-offf
nearly lobs the ball up into the blockhole outside off, Sarkar won't let it threaten his stumps
slower ball, not quite as well disguised as he usual ones as Mahmudullah picks it up and nudges into the midwicket region. it's acres of empty space there and Mohit has to chase it down himself
goes short and targets off stump to hamper the pull, which is the shot he goes for. Cramped for room, it's too high to muscle away, and is beaten
another bouncer, this one slipping a shade down leg at 129 kph, Sarkar is content to duck under it
third on the trot and perhaps the best of the lot - bouncer lifting above the shoulder and sails over middle stump. Sarkar attempts a pull, but in vain

he's softened him up with the bouncers and the fuller one comes and nearly picks the wicket. Lures the drive on the up and the ball strikes the bat higher than intended and just about lobs the short cover fielder
one of his back-of-the-handers which nearly fools Mahmudullah. Reconises it after it pitches and stays back to tap it towards point
flighted on off stump, Sarkar eases it to the right of extra cover
keeps it full on off stump, Mahmudullah is forward with a straight bat and drives to the left of Jadeja at mid-on. A fumble lets him exchange ends with Sarkar

another telling, composed, confident strike! Saw that Raina is just bowling wicket to wicket on a fuller length and he raced down the track, made his own room and turned a good ball into a bad one. All he had to do after that was lift it through the covers. Lovely cricket
and of course the next ball is shorter and he camps back to cut behind point
slid into the pads and Mahmudullah works it to long leg quite deftly
flatter and speared in onto Sarkar's pads. He was opening up those shoulders for a pull, but the ball came onto him a bit too quickly to succeed. it's drinks
loose delivery to start as he goes short and provides the perfect height for Mahmudullah to swivel on the back foot and direct the ball to long leg

that's the height he wants if he wants to bowl short - manages it to soar around the batsman's shoulder. Sarkar tries to stay beside it and ramp it over the keeper. Beaten and gets a word or two from his partner
shortish and outside off, slid off the open face to deep third man
138kph, full on off stump, gets Mahmudullah forward to block
sizes up the bouncer and sways away from it. Outside off, but not to wide

it was a short ball, it was coming in at Mahmudullah who goes for an instinctive pull. But it seems to spew off the top edge. Yet it was travelling and seemed to lob the fielder at long leg, but Dhawan has pulled off a magnificent juggling act. Admittedly the ball popped out of his hands as he went for a reverse-cup catch. But he regrouped quickly, took the second attempt but that was when his left leg was about an inch away from disturbing the rope. He knew he has to toss the ball back into the field of play. Did that so very well and then wandered back in to pick up the catch
flighted on leg stump, he is forward to block
good length ball, but what happens after it pitched is the story. Turns square, makes Shakib look silly and nearly toppled the top of off. Too good
tossed up outside off, leans forward and drives into the covers
nudged behind square leg, but can't pick the gap
good length ball on and around off stump, defended
that's a right old tonk! Reaches the pitch of the ball and once he's done that there is no risk in hammering it over cow corner. What power
shuffles across outside off, but he might have been better served getting forward and pushing down the ground. Beaten on the back foot
goes short and Shakib has pulled it cleanly to deep midwicket

shortish delivery, but it is around the fifth stump. Not where you can cut from and Shakib realises it quite late. Tries to chop it down and misses. Shami thought there was an edge, but he gets no support from Dhoni which likely means there wasn't
goes short and seems to hustle Shakib as he goes for a pull, gets it high off the bat and it lobs over the vacant midwicket field

another attempted pull shot, this time from Sarkar, and it nearly ended up as a caught and bowled chance. Gets it right off the bottom of the bat as he tried to make his own room against a back of a length delivery on off stump. Doesn't quite succeed in the way he hoped
so he goes the other way, staying put on leg stump to try and run the shortish ball to third man. Only it's too tight on middle and leg and he only manages an inside edge
quicker and flighted on leg stump, defended
keeps him to the crease with a good length ball and the pace he bowls with hassles Shakib
slips down leg in his attempt not the give room
goes on middle and leg, Shakib moves inside the line and clips behind square leg
stays back to a good length ball and punches into the covers. Can't get the gap he wants. Sarkar appears nervous....
tossed up on middle, he leans forward with an open face and drives in front of point
a shade on leg stump, clipped towards square leg
fuller delivery on off stump, he prefers to stay inside the line and push it to cover
wanders outside off to open up the yawning leg side, but Shami has followed his movement and cramps him up with a short ball just under his chest

that's the second time he's controlled the ramp, and it's a useful weapon against the short ball on middle and off. Weaves his torso away to the leg side and taps the ball on top of the bounce over the keeper

how is that for a catch?! it's a rare sight to see Dhoni diving, but he has here and has plucked a one-handed screamer! Shami goes for another short ball bowled cross-seam, Sarkar looks for an encore of the ramp, but realises this is the slower bouncer. He does't have to pace to work with, he committed to the stroke too early and the ball simply runs off the open face. Dhoni moved to his left, dived full length and the ball somehow manages to find a seat in his left glove
excellent intent from Shami, serves up a bouncer straight up. It's on middle too which means Mushfiqur has to hurry in his efforts to get under it
back of a length and outside off, Mushy covers his stumps and lets it go
tossed up, slower through the air, Shakib defends carefully
flightede on middle and off, Shakib blocks it out
good length ball on middle, Shakib lets it come on and then defends
a hint of room, a little flatter in trajectory and Shakib cuts to point
flighted on middle, driven down the ground but Ashwin hunts it down with a dive to his right
pushed through on off stump, Shakib can only keep it out
full and outside off, Mushy presents a lovely drive to the left of mid-off
shortish on off stump, Mushy is right behind it though. Looking composed against India's preferred mode of attack
well bowled, tests Mushy in the off-stump corridor with a good length ball and he passes it because he lets the ball pass
gets some swing going away from the bat and that's why Mushy's front-foot push through the covers fails
goes wide of the crease to a shortish ball on middle and leg and tucks it to midwicket
full on middle, pushed to mid-on
tossed up outside off, sent into the covers
tossed up on leg stump, it was a touch slower too, Shakib brings a defensive bat down on it
goes short and wide this time, but there is protection for that mistake as the cut reaches deep point.
nicely flighted, and he gets a little drift away too, Mushy is forward to block
stays back to a flatter delivery on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
amazing offspin bowling as he tosses the ball up and lures the push into the covers, then the ball dips, turns and gets the inside edge. The way he's varied his pace today has been striking
slides into the pads and Shakib works it towards long leg
flatter delivery that's off target. Shakib tries to reach it with a pull, can't connect and settles for a wide
gets back and punches a flatter delivery from off stump to long-on
tossed up, a bit slower, on middle and leg. Mushy defends
jumps back and away from the short ball to cut it from the stumps to deep point
flighted on off stump, gets a good front-foot stride in and pushes past the bowler
and Dhoni himself runs across to the tap towards square leg
tapped through point for a single
flighted on off stump, doesn't turn and Ashwin intended for that, I think. Defended
lots of turn this time, but since it is slow and short, Mushy can move outside leg and cut behind point. Brilliant running as well to pick up a couple
tossed up on off stump, Mushy gets onto one knee and slog sweeps past midwicket's extended right hand. Took a risk there playing across the line
tossed up on middle and off, defended
flatter delivery on middle and leg, nudged towards square leg
shortish and outside off, bunted down to long-on
tossed up on off stump, driven down to long-off
short and has just enough room for him to cut to deep point
goes back and tries to work a good length ball into the gap at midwicket, can't find it. Can't free his arms
tossed up on off stump, worked toward midwicket
knocked behind square leg
tossed up outside off, he came down the track and took it on the pad as he didn't reach the pitch of the ball
turning in from outside off, tucked behind square on leg
bit of flight on the middle stump, forward defensive on the off side
goes back this time as the ball is angled in. and he defends dangerously on the off side
errs a bit towards leg side, deflected off the pad to short fine leg
on the leg side again, leg bye off the pad just wide of short third man for one
comes down the track and takes it on the pad

cut straight to short third man, couldn't have been an easier wicket! There was room, there was time, but there was short third man too! Shakib went on the back foot and sliced the ball from well outside off straight to Shami
fullish outside off, pushed into the covers
just short of length outside off, he waits for it to turn and defends
helps the middle and leg delivery from back of length with the angle behind square on leg
straight on middle stump, Mushfiqur blocks it back
flighted and full well outside off, driven to cover off the front foot
touch shorter and closer to batsman, he leans forward and defends it back
goes down on a knee to sweep it with the turn from way outside off to deep square leg for two
defends the flatter delivery on off and middle back on leg side
presses forward and defends it on the off side
length delivery on the off side, blocked on the off side again
flighted on off, driven down to long off for one
length delivery on middle and leg, clipped to the leg side for one
tossed up and Mushfiq launches it against the turn right in the gap to the wide long-on boundary for a one-bounce four
much straighter on middle stump, he blocks it back
flatter and quicker towards middle and leg, defends it late, hence dangerously
leans forward and pushes it into the covers
turning in from outside off, helped off the back foot towards midwicket for one
shorter and wider outside off, jabbed towards backward point for one. Just when Mushfiqur dragged his bat in the crease, Dhoni casually deflected the ball through his legs and appealed. But not out
comes down to take it on the full, drives to long on for one
goes on the back foot to cut the ball to sweeper cover for one
leans forward and pushes it wide of point for one
he presses forward for the length delivery and blocks it back
pretty close to off stump, he goes back and cuts it late with some risk to backward point
fullish around off and it's driven down to long off for one
leans forward and pushes into the covers for one
makes room for the ball that was angling in and drives it inside out beautifully over the covers
on the other side now, swept against the turn for four! Got down on the knee for the length delivery on the stumps, got to the pitch of the ball and found the gap at midwicket boundary
drives a nearly yorker-length delivery down to long on for one
shortish and outside off, knocked into the covers
back of a length on off stump, pushes him back as he taps and runs into the covers. Jaddu swoops in and nails the throw at the bowlers' end, but he's made it
moves away to the leg side and tries a slash through the covers, gets an inside edge towards long leg
shortish and sliding into the pads, goes for a flick but misses
not enough room for the cut, Sabbir manages to get the ball away to deep third man but there isn't much timing on it
moves around the wicket, but produces the double bluff as he bowls full on off stump. Sliced to deep cover
goes for the bouncer and Mushy is happy to evade it. Then he shadow practices a pull over long leg
reaches out to the flighted delivery outside off, defends into the covers
a shade short and Mushy pulls out the cut to deep point
flighted outside off to bring the batsman forward and drive with the open face. Sabbir keeps it down though and finds the sweeper
goes a bit more round-arm and angles the good length ball on off stump, defended
a low full toss, tapped down to long-off.
nice and full outside off, Mushy uses half of his bat to pick the gap through the covers and then head off for a drink

it had to happen! Beware the batting Powerplay. The short ball skids onto him far too quickly for his pull, takes a leading edge while he was only midway through the stroke and simply shot straight up. Dhoni says it's mine, spreads his arms out to make sure everyone knew it and pouches it cleanly.
back of a length on off stump, blocked

opened him up with a beautiful away seamer. Doesn't look in any position to handle it and chases at the ball with his hands, which go the opposite way from his body, Dhoni doesn't dive this time and there is no slip. Safe outside edge
shortish and outside off, eased down to third man
gets on top of the bounce, manages to judge his pace perfectly. So much that he has pulled well in front of square. Came down on the ball and walloped it
short and wide, Sabbir has hammered it over point to the point bouncer. Raced away
banged short, perhaps a bit too much so for the umpires' liking, Nasir gets under it
keeps him back in his crease with a short delivery on off stump, Nasir absorbs the pace and secures a single into the covers. Raina had run in hard, but didn't pick the ball up
makes him hop with a bouncer on middle and leg, Sabbir manages to ride it down to long leg

full and the length allows the ball to straighten on off stump, gets the leading edge as Nasir appears clueless for a minute. Was looking more midwicket before he realises the danger and tries his hardest to play with a straight face
banged in short and Nasir doesn't bother with it
short and wide, rocks back and slaps it through point. Impressive power in the stroke, barely bothered keeping it down
low full toss on off stump, sliced into the covers
back of a length on off stump, defended
lets the short ball come on and plants the angled face down on the ball to run it to deep third man
shortish on middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket
slaps a short ball that has room to deep third man
not enough room to cut, Sabbir goes for it anyway and hears an ugly plonk as the ball is mistimed to point
goes wide of the crease for a short ball on off stump, the batsman is forced to get off his feet as he blocks
slower bouncer this time, Nasir was into the pull shot a bit too early and is beaten
lines up the short ball perfectly and pulls in front of midwicket. Dhawan is down there, running to his left, dives and manages to keep it in the playing area despite a little fumble
they've succeeded with this tactic so why should they change. Keeps pounding into the middle of the pitch and the batsman ducks under it again
gets up off his toes to knock the short ball to point
swaps out for a fuller ball on off stump, flicked towards midwicket. A little uppishly
was itching to come forward because of the flight on the ball, the pace it was bowled at made him wait though. Taps it to short third man
flighted outside off, drifts away before it turns into the defensive bat
a touch short and the batsman goes back to punch to cover
fired in flat and fast into the pads, easily flicked to deep midwicket

dropped. A short ball, seemed set to release the pressure but Sabbir has failed to keep it down and picks out Dhawan to perfection. He had to come forward though, and the ball seemed to be wobbling on its way down to him. Tries to get two hands to it, fails
runs down the track and clears mid-on comfortably. Nasir's come in with a bit of intent, but how long will this flurry last? Very good stroke, taking the spinner on
and creates the shorter length which he cracks to point
fired in on middle, kept out by Nasir
fired in on middle with a bit more pronounced, round-arm action. Defended
flighted outside off, driven calmly to long-off.
shortish on middle and off, Nasir is up on his toes to nudges to midwicket
keeps it short, but Nasir has been comfortable on the back foot. Nails a pull well in front of square. No one patrolling that area
that's a much better bouncer, adds a few more clicks to it and has it soaring over leg stump. Nasir ducks away
another short ball on off stump, Nasir weaves away from the line of it
it's a flurry, it's been a flurry all day. The bowler digging into the middle of the deck and a Bangladesh batsman swaying away from it
a bit fuller, but Nasir remained on the back foot and slaps it to deep third man
a bit too much flight there and he drives a full toss through the covers
goes for a reverse sweep, but the ploy doesn't work. Can;t get to the pitch of it and the ball turns away - though not as far as Dhoni thinks and he is beaten too
down the track, but he's beaten in the flight. Manages a thick outside edge that leaps away to the third man boundary
reaches as far as he could and unleashes a full swing of his arms, the slog sweep to the length ball clatters into the midwicket boundary
loops the ball up to tempt the drive, out it comes but Nasir has failed to keep it down. Nor did he place it. Picks out Ashwin at short cover. Time for the tail, time for some fun
mistimes a pull off the short ball, and it travels much of the 30-yard circle in the air. But there isn't anyone anywhere near it
shortish on middle and leg, dabbed into the off side for a quick single as Jaddu nails a direct hit
races down the track, but Sabbir is fooled by the slower ball. Excellent bowling from Mohit. Saw the batsman was itching to go and robbed him of the pace he wanted
this was short, and fast. Sabbir had pressed forward, then shifted his weight back and nails a pull to deep midwicket
shortish on off stump, sliced to point. A bit timidly actually since he was running away to the leg side

they've got another, Dhoni's got another! It was full and a shade outside off, Mashrafe hurts himself by staying put outside leg stump and poking at the ball. It almost runs off the face to the keeper
happy to pull a short ball on middle to deep square leg. Powerfully struck, and nearly carries to the fielder there. Dhawan again
short on off stump, Rubel looks to clear his front leg and swipe. But it comes onto him too quickly. Gets the splice of the bat towards mid-off
short ball consumes Rubel as Kohli shakes his head, almost sadly. Too quick for him, too straight for him to free the arms and the top edge is safely pouched at square leg
he's been good on the pull, strikes it to deep square leg and denies the single

nearly popped out, but the second grab does it. India are into the  semi-finals with the 100th win under MS Dhoni. Had to be a short ball to sign things off and the top-edged pull flies to long leg. The fielder got under it, but might have been a touch nervous. Hard hands meant he nearly spilled it, but he was alert enough to grab the rebound
